["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"src/CompoundSupplyManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf9a91317a4e1642a89d45b40566f2a46212c34e02a8c908b25e9ff6d241e4965","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://691782566ab4e2f33e13cd92f2d295afe7db14b5fb9681966a20cf078ebce111","dweb:/ipfs/Qmc3B33GW6F49Yx1e7UQ1SrNPDdKWiz5hdoR8sQsHXvure"]},"src/interfaces/ICErc20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x00a495e7c893f9fb027812b981ab1870ca25802229352c05c54ca9aa43fb2e60","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4e8fc727a030fcad783db493d25e1b4e5ed1c0ebc90fa7b8203aa127dfb8a088","dweb:/ipfs/QmSvzQDytFgVN95WnLHBjLEBrPE2feJpaQYYexre3CaZmY"]}},"version":1}

params._cToken: The address of the corresponding cToken on the Compound protocol (e.g., cDAI)
params._token: The address of the ERC20 token that will be supplied (e.g., DAI)

estimateBalanceOfUnderlying().details: This function calculates the underlying asset balance by multiplying the cToken balance by the current exchange rate and adjusting for token decimals

returns._0: The estimated balance of the underlying asset in the smallest unit of the ERC20 token (e.g., if the token is DAI, this would be in wei)

getCTokenBalance().details: This function returns the cToken balance for the contract's address

returns._0: The number of cTokens held by this contract

getInfo().details: This function calls the `exchangeRateCurrent` and `supplyRatePerBlock` functions on the cToken to get the latest values

returns.exchangeRate: The current exchange rate between the cToken and the underlying asset, scaled by 1e18
returns.supplyRatePerBlock: The current supply interest rate per block, scaled by 1e18

supply(uint256).custom:error: MintFailed Reverts if the minting of cTokens fails (i.e., if the result is not 0)
supply(uint256).details: Transfers the specified amount of tokens from the user, approves the cToken contract to spend the tokens, and mints cTokens

params._amount: The amount of the ERC20 token to supply (in the smallest unit, considering decimals)

returns._0: The result of the mint operation (0 indicates success)

cToken().notice: The cToken representing the supplied ERC20 token on the Compound protocol

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the contract with the ERC20 token and corresponding cToken addresses

estimateBalanceOfUnderlying().notice: Estimate the current balance of the underlying asset held by this contract in terms of the ERC20 token

getCTokenBalance().notice: Get the current balance of cTokens held by this contract

getInfo().notice: Retrieve the current exchange rate and supply rate per block from the Compound protocol

supply(uint256).notice: Supply a specified amount of the ERC20 token to the Compound protocol

token().notice: The underlying ERC20 token that will be supplied to the Compound protocol
